name: Python for the Life Sciences
tagline: A gentle introduction to Python for life scientists
body:
### This is the public code repository for the book: **Python for the Life Sciences**
![Python For The Life Sciences: Cover](https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/11210070/python-life-sciences.002.png)
This is where you can download or browse the code for the book [_Python for the Life Sciences_](http://pythonforthelifesciences.com) released by @amberbiology.  The book is available via [Leanpub](http://leanpub.com/pythonforthelifesciences)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
